抽象类型
Abstract type		该抽象类型的上界类型
The upper bound type of the abstract type

利用Factory实现抽象成员的能力，DeepLearning.scala的插件系统能向系统中注入一切功能，比如修改神经网络的优化方式、添加新的原子操作、网络层或者子网络、记录日志、甚至替换掉整个后端。
With the ability to implement abstract members with Factory, DeepLearning.scala's plugin system can inject everything into the system, such as modifying the optimization of neural networks, adding new atomic operations, network layers or subnetworks, logging, and even replacing entire backends.

@atry 2016-09-25 15:41 字数 4219 阅读 2466

More than React（一）为什么ReactJS不适合复杂交互的前端项目？
More than React (1) Why is ReactJS not suitable for complex interactive front-end projects?

前端 binding.scala data-binding scala.js react

《More than React》系列的文章会一共分为五篇。本文是第一篇，介绍用 ReactJS开发时遇到的种种问题。后面四篇文章的每一篇将会分别详细讨论其中一个问题，以及Binding.scala如何解决这个问题。
The "More than React" series of articles will be divided into five articles. This article is the first one, introducing various problems encountered when developing with ReactJS. Each of the next four articles will discuss one of these problems in detail, and how Binding.scala solves it.

背景介绍
background introduction

去年 4 月，我第一次在某个客户的项目中接触到ReactJS 。
I first encountered ReactJS on a client project last April.

我发现ReactJS要比我以前用过的AngularJS简单很多，它提供了响应式的数据绑定功能，把数据映射到网页上，使我可以轻松实现交互简单的网站。
I found that ReactJS is much simpler than the AngularJS I used before. It provides a responsive data binding function and maps data to web pages, so that I can easily implement websites with simple interactions.

然而，随着我越来越深入的使用ReactJS，我发现用ReactJS编写交互复杂的网页很困难。我希望有一种方式，能够像ReactJS一样简单解决简单问题。此外，还要能简单解决复杂问题。
However, as I use ReactJS more and more deeply, I find it difficult to write complex web pages with ReactJS. I hope there is a way to solve simple problems as easily as ReactJS. In addition, it is necessary to be able to solve complex problems simply.

于是我把ReactJS用Scala重新写了一个。代码量从近三万行降到了一千多行。
So I rewrote ReactJS in Scala. The amount of code dropped from nearly 30,000 lines to more than 1,000 lines.

用这个框架实现的 TodoMVC 应用，只用了154行代码。而用ReactJS实现相同功能的TodoMVC，需要488行代码。
The TodoMVC application implemented with this framework only uses 154 lines of code. TodoMVC, which implements the same function with ReactJS, requires 488 lines of code.

下图是用Binding.scala实现的TodoMVC应用。
The figure below is a TodoMVC application implemented with Binding.scala.

这个框架就是Binding.scala。
This framework is Binding.scala.

问题一：ReactJS组件难以在复杂交互页面中复用
Problem 1: ReactJS components are difficult to reuse in complex interactive pages

ReactJS中的最小复用单位是组件。ReactJS的组件比AngularJS的Controller和View 要轻量些。每个组件只需要前端开发者提供一个 render 函数，把 props 和 state 映射成网页元素。
The smallest unit of reuse in ReactJS is the component. ReactJS components are lighter than AngularJS Controller and View. Each component only needs a render function provided by the front-end developer to map props and state into web page elements.

这样的轻量级组件在渲染简单静态页面时很好用，但是如果页面有交互，就必须在组件间传递回调函数来处理事件。尤其是复杂的网页结构，往往需要多个组件层层嵌套，导致回调函数也必须在父子组件间层层传递，代码变成一团乱麻，维护就很难了。
Such lightweight components are good for rendering simple static pages, but if the page is interactive, callback functions must be passed between components to handle events. Especially complex web page structures often require multiple components to be nested layer by layer, resulting in the callback function having to be passed layer by layer between parent and child components. The code becomes a mess and maintenance is difficult.

我将在《More than React（二）React.Component损害了复用性？》中用原生DHTML API、ReactJS和Binding.scala实现同一个需要复用的页面，介绍Binding.scala如何简单实现可复用的复杂交互逻辑。
I will be in "More than React (2) React.Component damages reusability? "Use native DHTML API, ReactJS and Binding.scala to implement the same page that needs to be reused, and introduce how Binding.scala can easily implement reusable complex interaction logic.

问题二：ReactJS的虚拟DOM 算法又慢又不准
Problem 2: The virtual DOM algorithm of ReactJS is slow and inaccurate

ReactJS的页面渲染算法是虚拟DOM差量算法。
The page rendering algorithm of ReactJS is a virtual DOM difference algorithm.

开发者需要提供 render 函数，根据 props 和 state 生成虚拟 DOM。然后 ReactJS 框架根据 render 返回的虚拟 DOM 创建相同结构的真实 DOM.
Developers need to provide render function to generate virtual DOM according to props and state . Then the ReactJS framework creates a real DOM with the same structure based on the virtual DOM returned by render .

每当 state 更改时，ReacJS 框架重新调用 render 函数，获取新的虚拟 DOM 。然后，框架会比较上次生成的虚拟 DOM 和新的虚拟 DOM 有哪些差异，然后把差异应用到真实DOM上。
Whenever state changes, the ReacJS framework re-calls the render function to get a new virtual DOM. Then, the framework will compare the differences between the last generated virtual DOM and the new virtual DOM, and then apply the differences to the real DOM.

这样做有两大缺点：
This has two major disadvantages:

  1. 每次 state 更改，render 函数都要生成完整的虚拟 DOM. 哪怕 state 改动很小，render函数也会完整计算一遍。如果 render 函数很复杂，这个过程就白白浪费了很多计算资源。
    Every time state is changed, the render function will generate a complete virtual DOM. Even if state is changed slightly, the render function will calculate it completely. If the render function is very complicated, this process will waste a lot of computing resources.
  2. ReactJS框架比较虚拟DOM差异的过程，既慢又容易出错。比如，假如你想要在某个 <ul> 列表的顶部插入一项 <li> ，那么ReactJS框架会误以为你修改了 <ul> 的每一项 <li>，然后在尾部插入了一个 <li>。
    The process by which the ReactJS framework compares virtual DOM differences is slow and error-prone. For example, if you want to insert an <li> at the top of a <ul> list, the ReactJS framework will mistakenly think that you have modified every <li> of <ul> , and then insert a <li> at the end.

这是因为 ReactJS收到的新旧两个虚拟DOM之间相互独立，ReactJS并不知道数据源发生了什么操作，只能根据新旧两个虚拟DOM来猜测需要执行的操作。自动的猜测算法既不准又慢，必须要前端开发者手动提供 key 属性、shouldComponentUpdate 方法、componentDidUpdate 方法或者 componentWillUpdate 等方法才能帮助 ReactJS 框架猜对。
This is because the old and new virtual DOMs received by ReactJS are independent of each other. ReactJS does not know what operations have occurred on the data source, and can only guess the operations to be performed based on the old and new virtual DOMs. The automatic guessing algorithm is both inaccurate and slow. Front-end developers must manually provide key attributes, shouldComponentUpdate methods, componentDidUpdate methods or componentWillUpdate methods to help the ReactJS framework guess correctly.

我将在《More than React（三）虚拟DOM已死？》中比较ReactJS、AngularJS和Binding.scala渲染机制，介绍简单性能高的Binding.scala精确数据绑定机制。
I will be in "More than React (3) Is the virtual DOM dead? In "Compare ReactJS, AngularJS and Binding.scala rendering mechanism, introduce the simple and high-performance Binding.scala precise data binding mechanism.

问题三：ReactJS的HTML模板功能既不完备、也不健壮
Problem 3: The HTML template function of ReactJS is neither complete nor robust

ReactJS支持用JSX编写HTML模板。
ReactJS supports writing HTML templates with JSX.

理论上，前端工程师只要把静态HTML原型复制到JSX源文件中，增加一些变量替换代码，就能改造成动态页面。理论上这种做法要比Cycle.js、Widok、ScalaTags等框架更适合复用设计师提供的HTML原型。
In theory, front-end engineers can transform it into a dynamic page as long as they copy the static HTML prototype into the JSX source file and add some variable replacement codes. In theory, this approach is more suitable for reusing HTML prototypes provided by designers than frameworks such as Cycle.js, Widok, and ScalaTags.

不幸的是，ReactJS对HTML的支持残缺不全。开发者必须手动把class和for属性替换成className和htmlFor，还要把内联的style样式从CSS语法改成JSON语法，代码才能运行。这种开发方式下，前端工程师虽然可以把HTML原型复制粘贴到代码中，但还需要大量改造才能实际运行。比Cycle.js、Widok、或者、ScalaTags省不了太多事。
Unfortunately, ReactJS' support for HTML is incomplete. Developers must manually replace class and for attributes with className and htmlFor , and also change the inline style style from CSS syntax to JSON syntax before the code can run. In this development method, although the front-end engineer can copy and paste the HTML prototype into the code, it still needs a lot of modification to actually run. Can't save much work than Cycle.js, Widok, or, ScalaTags.

除此之外，ReactJS还提供了propTypes机制校验虚拟DOM的合法性。然而，这一机制也漏洞百出。即使指定了propTypes，ReactJS也不能在编译前提前发现错误。只有测试覆盖率很高的项目时才能在每个组件使用其他组件时进行校验。即使测试覆盖率很高，propTypes仍旧不能检测出拼错的属性名，如果你把onClick写成了onclick，ReactJS就不会报错，往往导致开发者额外花费大量时间排查一个很简单的bug。
In addition, ReactJS also provides the propTypes mechanism to verify the validity of the virtual DOM. However, this mechanism is also full of loopholes. Even if propTypes is specified, ReactJS cannot detect errors in advance before compiling. Validation when each component uses other components is only possible when testing projects with high coverage. Even if the test coverage rate is high, propTypes still cannot detect misspelled property names. If you write onClick as onclick , ReactJS will not report an error, often causing developers to spend a lot of time troubleshooting a very simple bug.

我将在《More than React（四）HTML也可以静态编译？》中比较ReactJS和Binding.scala的HTML模板，介绍Binding.scala如何在完整支持XHTML语法的同时静态检查语法错误和语义错误。
I will be in "More than React (4) HTML can also be statically compiled? "Compare the HTML templates of ReactJS and Binding.scala, and introduce how Binding.scala can statically check syntax errors and semantic errors while fully supporting XHTML syntax.

问题四：ReactJS与服务器通信时需要复杂的异步编程
Question 4: ReactJS requires complex asynchronous programming when communicating with the server

ReactJS从服务器加载数据时的架构可以看成MVVM(Model–View–ViewModel)模式。前端工程师需要编写一个服务访问层作为Model，把ReactJS的state当做ViewModel，而render当做View。Model负责访问后端API并把数据设置到state(即View Model)上，可以用Promise和fetch API实现。然后，render，即View，负责把View Model渲染到页面上。
The architecture of ReactJS when loading data from the server can be seen as the MVVM (Model–View–ViewModel) pattern. Front-end engineers need to write a service access layer as the Model, using state of ReactJS as the ViewModel and render as the View. Model is responsible for accessing the backend API and setting the data to state (ie View Model), which can be implemented with Promise and fetch API. Then, render , the View, is responsible for rendering the View Model to the page.

在这整套流程中，前端程序员需要编写大量闭包组成的异步流程，设置、访问状态的代码五零四散，一不小心就会bug丛生，就算小心翼翼的处理各种异步事件，也会导致程序变得复杂，既难调试，又难维护。
In this entire process, front-end programmers need to write an asynchronous process composed of a large number of closures. The code for setting and accessing the state is scattered, and bugs will arise if you are not careful. Even if you handle various asynchronous events carefully, it will also lead to Programs become complex, difficult to debug, and difficult to maintain.

我将在《More than React（五）异步编程是一种糟糕的编程模型？》中比较ReactJS和Binding.scala的数据同步模型，介绍Binding.scala如何自动同步服务器数据，避免手动异步编程。
I will be in "More than React (5) Is asynchronous programming a bad programming model? "Compare the data synchronization models of ReactJS and Binding.scala, and introduce how Binding.scala automatically synchronizes server data to avoid manual asynchronous programming.

结论
in conclusion

尽管Binding.scala初看上去很像ReactJS，但隐藏在Binding.scala背后的机制更简单、更通用，与ReactJS和Widok截然不同。
Although Binding.scala looks a lot like ReactJS at first glance, the mechanism behind Binding.scala is simpler and more general, which is completely different from ReactJS and Widok.

所以，通过简化概念，Binding.scala灵活性更强，能用通用的方式解决ReactJS解决不了的复杂问题。
Therefore, by simplifying the concept, Binding.scala is more flexible and can solve complex problems that ReactJS cannot solve in a general way.

比如，除了上述四个方面以外，ReactJS的状态管理也是老大难问题，如果引入Redux或者react-router这样的第三方库来处理状态，会导致架构变复杂，分层变多，代码绕来绕去。而Binding.scala可以用和页面渲染一样的数据绑定机制描述复杂的状态，不需要任何第三方库，就能提供服务器通信、状态管理和网址分发的功能。
For example, in addition to the above four aspects, the state management of ReactJS is also a long-standing problem. If a third-party library such as Redux or react-router is introduced to handle the state, the architecture will become more complex, the layers will increase, and the code will go around. . However, Binding.scala can use the same data binding mechanism as page rendering to describe complex states. It does not require any third-party libraries to provide server communication, state management, and URL distribution functions.

When I published Binding.scala on the Scala.js forum more than two months ago, the most popular responsive front-end programming framework in the Scala.js community was Widok. Tim Nieradzik is the author of Widok. After seeing the framework I released, he praised this framework as the most promising HTML 5 rendering framework in the Scala.js community.

In several recent projects, I also gradually abandoned JavaScript and ReactJS, and switched to Scala.js and Binding.scala to build a new era of front-end technology stack.

@atry 2016-09-25 00:22 字数 6430 阅读 1594

More than React（二）React.Component损害了复用性？
More than React (2) React.Component damages reusability?

前端 binding.scala data-binding scala.js

《More than React》系列的上一篇文章《为什么ReactJS不适合复杂的前端项目》列举了前端开发中的种种痛点。本篇文章中将详细探讨其中“复用性”痛点。我们将用原生 DHTML API 、 ReactJS 和 Binding.scala 实现同一个需要复用的标签编辑器，然后比较三个标签编辑器哪个实现难度更低，哪个更好用。
The previous article of the "More than React" series "Why ReactJS is not suitable for complex front-end projects" lists various pain points in front-end development. This article will discuss in detail the "reusability" pain point. We will use the native DHTML API, ReactJS and Binding.scala to implement the same tag editor that needs to be reused, and then compare which of the three tag editors is easier to implement and which one is easier to use.

标签编辑器的功能需求
Feature Requirements for Tag Editor

在InfoQ的许多文章都有标签。比如本文的标签是“binding.scala”、“data-binding”、“scala.js”。
Many articles in InfoQ are tagged. For example, the tags in this article are "binding.scala", "data-binding", and "scala.js".

假如你要开发一个博客系统，你也希望博客作者可以添加标签。所以你可能会提供标签编辑器供博客作者使用。
If you are developing a blogging system, you also want bloggers to be able to add tags. So you might offer a tag editor for bloggers to use.

如图所示，标签编辑器在视觉上分为两行。
As shown, the tag editor is visually divided into two lines.

第一行展示已经添加的所有标签，每个标签旁边有个“x”按钮可以删除标签。第二行是一个文本框和一个“Add”按钮可以把文本框的内容添加为新标签。每次点击“Add”按钮时，标签编辑器应该检查标签是否已经添加过，以免重复添加标签。而在成功添加标签后，还应清空文本框，以便用户输入新的标签。
The first row shows all the tags that have been added, and there is an "x" button next to each tag to delete the tag. The second line is a text box and an "Add" button to add the content of the text box as a new label. Every time the "Add" button is clicked, the tag editor should check if the tag has already been added, so as not to add tags twice. After successfully adding a label, the text box should also be cleared so that the user can enter a new label.

除了用户界面以外，标签编辑器还应该提供 API 。标签编辑器所在的页面可以用 API 填入初始标签，也可以调用 API 随时增删查改标签。如果用户增删了标签，应该有某种机制通知页面的其他部分。
In addition to a user interface, a tag editor should also provide an API. The page where the tag editor is located can use the API to fill in the initial tags, or call the API to add, delete, check and modify tags at any time. If a user adds or removes tags, there should be some mechanism to notify the rest of the page.

原生 DHTML 版
Native DHTML version

首先，我试着不用任何前端框架，直接调用原生的 DHTML API 来实现标签编辑器，代码如下：
First, I tried to directly call the native DHTML API to implement the tag editor without using any front-end framework. The code is as follows:

  1. <!DOCTYPE html>
  2. <html>
  3. <head>
  4.   <script>
  5.     var tags = [];
  7.     function hasTag(tag) {
  8.       for (var i = 0; i < tags.length; i++) {
  9.         if (tags[i].tag == tag) {
  10.           return true;
  11.         }
  12.       }
  13.       return false;
  14.     }
  16.     function removeTag(tag) {
  17.       for (var i = 0; i < tags.length; i++) {
  18.         if (tags[i].tag == tag) {
  19.           document.getElementById("tags-parent").removeChild(tags[i].element);
  20.           tags.splice(i, 1);
  21.           return;
  22.         }
  23.       }
  24.     }
  26.     function addTag(tag) {
  27.       var element = document.createElement("q");
  28.       element.textContent = tag;
  29.       var removeButton = document.createElement("button");
  30.       removeButton.textContent = "x";
  31.       removeButton.onclick = function (event) {
  32.         removeTag(tag);
  33.       }
  34.       element.appendChild(removeButton);
  35.       document.getElementById("tags-parent").appendChild(element);
  36.       tags.push({
  37.         tag: tag,
  38.         element: element
  39.       });
  40.     }
  42.     function addHandler() {
  43.       var tagInput = document.getElementById("tag-input");
  44.       var tag = tagInput.value;
  45.       if (tag && !hasTag(tag)) {
  46.         addTag(tag);
  47.         tagInput.value = "";
  48.       }
  49.     }
  50.   </script>
  51. </head>
  52. <body>
  53.   <div id="tags-parent"></div>
  54.   <div>
  55.     <input id="tag-input" type="text"/>
  56.     <button onclick="addHandler()">Add</button>
  57.   </div>
  58.   <script>
  59.     addTag("initial-tag-1");
  60.     addTag("initial-tag-2");
  61.   </script>
  62. </body>
  63. </html>

为了实现标签编辑器的功能，我用了 45 行 JavaScript 代码来编写 UI 逻辑，外加若干的 HTML <div> 外加两行 JavaScript 代码填入初始化数据。
In order to implement the function of the tag editor, I used 45 lines of JavaScript code to write the UI logic, plus some HTML <div> plus two lines of JavaScript code to fill in the initialization data.

HTML 文件中硬编码了几个 <div>。这些<div> 本身并不是动态创建的，但可以作为容器，放置其他动态创建的元素。
There are several <div> hardcoded in the HTML file. These <div> themselves are not dynamically created, but can be used as containers for other dynamically created elements.

代码中的函数来会把网页内容动态更新到这些 <div> 中。所以，如果要在同一个页面显示两个标签编辑器，id 就会冲突。因此，以上代码没有复用性。
The function in the code will dynamically update the content of the web page to these <div> . So, if you want to display two tag editors on the same page, id will conflict. Therefore, the above code is not reusable.

就算用 jQuery 代替 DHTML API，代码复用仍然很难。为了复用 UI ，jQuery 开发者通常必须额外增加代码，在 onload 时扫描整个网页，找出具有特定 class 属性的元素，然后对这些元素进行修改。对于复杂的网页，这些 onload 时运行的函数很容易就会冲突，比如一个函数修改了一个 HTML 元素，常常导致另一处代码受影响而内部状态错乱。
Even with jQuery replacing the DHTML API, code reuse is still difficult. In order to reuse the UI, jQuery developers usually have to add extra code to scan the entire webpage at onload to find elements with specific class attributes, and then modify these elements. For complex web pages, these onload running functions can easily conflict. For example, one function modifies an HTML element, which often causes another code to be affected and the internal state to be disordered.

ReactJS 实现的标签编辑器组件
Tag editor component implemented by ReactJS

ReactJS 提供了可以复用的组件，即 React.Component 。如果用 ReactJS 实现标签编辑器，大概可以这样写：
ReactJS provides reusable components, namely React.Component . If you implement a tag editor with ReactJS, you can probably write it like this:

  1. class TagPicker extends React.Component {
  3.   static defaultProps = {
  4.     changeHandler: tags => {}
  5.   }
  7.   static propTypes = {
  8.     tags: React.PropTypes.arrayOf(React.PropTypes.string).isRequired,
  9.     changeHandler: React.PropTypes.func
  10.   }
  12.   state = {
  13.     tags: this.props.tags
  14.   }
  16.   addHandler = event => {
  17.     const tag = this.refs.input.value;
  18.     if (tag && this.state.tags.indexOf(tag) == -1) {
  19.       this.refs.input.value = "";
  20.       const newTags = this.state.tags.concat(tag);
  21.       this.setState({
  22.         tags: newTags
  23.       });
  24.       this.props.changeHandler(newTags);
  25.     }
  26.   }
  28.   render() {
  29.     return (
  30.       <section>
  31.         <div>{
  32.           this.state.tags.map(tag =>
  33.             <q key={ tag }>
  34.               { tag }
  35.               <button onClick={ event => {
  36.                 const newTags = this.state.tags.filter(t => t != tag);
  37.                 this.setState({ tags: newTags });
  38.                 this.props.changeHandler(newTags);
  39.               }}>x</button>
  40.             </q>
  41.           )
  42.         }</div>
  43.         <div>
  44.           <input type="text" ref="input"/>
  45.           <button onClick={ this.addHandler }>Add</button>
  46.         </div>
  47.       </section>
  48.     );
  49.   }
  51. }

以上 51 行 ECMAScript 2015 代码实现了一个标签编辑器组件，即TagPicker。虽然代码量比 DHTML 版长了一点点，但复用性大大提升了。
The above 51 lines of ECMAScript 2015 code implement a tag editor component, namely TagPicker . Although the amount of code is a little longer than the DHTML version, the reusability has been greatly improved.

如果你不用 ECMAScript 2015 的话，那么代码还会长一些，而且需要处理一些 JavaScript 的坑，比如在回调函数中用不了 this。
If you don't use ECMAScript 2015, the code will be longer, and you need to deal with some JavaScript pitfalls, such as not using this in the callback function.

ReactJS 开发者可以随时用 ReactDOM.render 函数把 TagPicker 渲染到任何空白元素内。此外，ReactJS 框架可以在 state 和 props 改变时触发 render ，从而避免了手动修改现存的 DOM。
ReactJS developers can use the ReactDOM.render function to render TagPicker into any empty element at any time. In addition, the ReactJS framework can trigger render when state and props change, thus avoiding manual modification of the existing DOM.

如果不考虑冗余的 key 属性，单个组件内的交互 ReactJS 还算差强人意。但是，复杂的网页结构往往需要多个组件层层嵌套，这种父子组件之间的交互，ReactJS 就很费劲了。
Interaction within a single component with ReactJS is pretty good, if you don't take into account the redundant key attribute. However, complex web page structures often require multiple components to be nested layer by layer. ReactJS is very laborious for the interaction between parent and child components.

比如，假如需要在 TagPicker 之外显示所有的标签，每当用户增删标签，这些标签也要自动更新。要实现这个功能，需要给 TagPicker 传入 changeHandler 回调函数，代码如下：
For example, if you need to display all tags except TagPicker , whenever users add or delete tags, these tags should also be automatically updated. To achieve this function, you need to pass changeHandler callback function to TagPicker , the code is as follows:

  1. class Page extends React.Component {
  3.   state = {
  4.     tags: [ "initial-tag-1", "initial-tag-2" ]
  5.   };
  7.   changeHandler = tags => {
  8.     this.setState({ tags });
  9.   };
  11.   render() {
  12.     return (
  13.       <div>
  14.         <TagPicker tags={ this.state.tags } changeHandler={ this.changeHandler }/>
  15.         <h3>全部标签：</h3>
  16.         <ol>{ this.state.tags.map(tag => <li>{ tag }</li> ) }</ol>
  17.       </div>
  18.     );
  19.   }
  21. }

为了能触发页面其他部分更新，我被迫增加了一个 21 行代码的 Page 组件。
In order to trigger other parts of the page to update, I was forced to add a Page component with 21 lines of code.

Page 组件必须实现 changeHandler 回调函数。每当回调函数触发，调用 Page 自己的 setState 来触发 Page 重绘。
Page components must implement changeHandler callback functions. Whenever the callback function is triggered, call Page 's own setState to trigger Page to redraw.

从这个例子，我们可以看出， ReactJS 可以简单的解决简单的问题，但碰上层次复杂、交互频繁的网页，实现起来就很繁琐。使用 ReactJS 的前端项目充满了各种 xxxHandler 用来在组件中传递信息。我参与的某海外客户项目，平均每个组件大约需要传入五个回调函数。如果层次嵌套深，创建网页时，常常需要把回调函数从最顶层的组件一层层传入最底层的组件，而当事件触发时，又需要一层层把事件信息往外传。整个前端项目有超过一半代码都在这样绕圈子。
From this example, we can see that ReactJS can easily solve simple problems, but it is very cumbersome to implement when encountering web pages with complex layers and frequent interactions. Front-end projects using ReactJS are full of various xxxHandler used to pass information in components. In an overseas client project I participated in, on average, about five callback functions need to be passed in to each component. If the nesting level is deep, when creating a web page, it is often necessary to pass the callback function from the topmost component to the bottommost component layer by layer, and when an event is triggered, it is necessary to pass the event information layer by layer. More than half of the code in the entire front-end project is going around in circles like this.

Binding.scala 的基本用法
Basic usage of Binding.scala

在讲解 Binding.scala 如何实现标签编辑器以前，我先介绍一些 Binding.scala 的基础知识：
Before explaining how Binding.scala implements the tag editor, let me introduce some basics of Binding.scala:

Binding.scala 中的最小复用单位是数据绑定表达式，即 @dom 方法。每个 @dom 方法是一段 HTML 模板。比如：
The smallest unit of reuse in Binding.scala is the data binding expression, namely the @dom method. Each @dom method is a piece of HTML template. for example:

  1. // 两个 HTML 换行符
  2. @dom def twoBr = <br/><br/>
  1. // 一个 HTML 标题
  2. @dom def myHeading(content: String) = <h1>{content}</h1>

每个模板还可以使用bind语法包含其他子模板，比如：
Each template can also contain other sub-templates using the bind syntax, such as:

  1. @dom def render = {
  2.   <div>
  3.     { myHeading("Binding.scala的特点").bind }
  4.     <p>
  5.       代码短
  6.       { twoBr.bind }
  7.       概念少
  8.       { twoBr.bind }
  9.       功能多
  10.     </p>
  11.   </div>
  12. }

你可以参见附录：Binding.scala快速上手指南，学习上手Binding.scala开发的具体步骤。
You can refer to Appendix: Binding.scala Quick Start Guide to learn the specific steps to get started with Binding.scala development.

此外，《More than React》系列第四篇文章《HTML也可以编译》还将列出Binding.scala所支持的完整HTML模板特性。
In addition, the fourth article of the "More than React" series "HTML can also be compiled" will also list the complete HTML template features supported by Binding.scala.

Binding.scala实现的标签编辑器模板
Tag editor template implemented by Binding.scala

最后，下文将展示如何用Binding.scala实现标签编辑器。
Finally, the following will show how to implement a tag editor with Binding.scala.

标签编辑器要比刚才介绍的HTML模板复杂，因为它不只是静态模板，还包含交互。
The tag editor is more complicated than the HTML template just introduced, because it is not just a static template, but also interactive.

  1. @dom def tagPicker(tags: Vars[String]) = {
  2.   val input: Input = <input type="text"/>
  3.   val addHandler = { event: Event =>
  4.     if (input.value != "" && !tags.get.contains(input.value)) {
  5.       tags.get += input.value
  6.       input.value = ""
  7.     }
  8.   }
  9.   <section>
  10.     <div>{
  11.       for (tag <- tags) yield <q>
  12.         { tag }
  13.         <button onclick={ event: Event => tags.get -= tag }>x</button>
  14.       </q>
  15.     }</div>
  16.     <div>{ input } <button onclick={ addHandler }>Add</button></div>
  17.   </section>
  18. }

这个标签编辑器的 HTML 模板一共用了 18 行代码就实现好了。
The HTML template for this tag editor was implemented in 18 lines of code.

标签编辑器中需要显示当前所有标签，所以此处用tags: Vars[String]保存所有的标签数据，再用for/yield循环把tags中的每个标签渲染成UI元素。
All current tags need to be displayed in the tag editor, so tags: Vars[String] is used here to save all tag data, and then for / yield is used to render each tag in tags into a UI element.

Vars 是支持数据绑定的列表容器，每当容器中的数据发生改变，UI就会自动改变。所以，在x按钮中的onclick事件中删除tags中的数据时，页面上的标签就会自动随之消失。同样，在Add按钮的onclick中向tags中添加数据时，页面上也会自动产生对应的标签。
Vars is a list container that supports data binding. Whenever the data in the container changes, the UI will change automatically. Therefore, when the data in tags is deleted in the onclick event in the x button, the label on the page will disappear automatically. Similarly, when adding data to tags in onclick of the Add button, the corresponding label will be automatically generated on the page.

Binding.scala不但实现标签编辑器比 ReactJS 简单，而且用起来也比 ReactJS 简单：
Binding.scala is not only simpler to implement a tag editor than ReactJS, but also easier to use than ReactJS:

  1. @dom def render() = {
  2.   val tags = Vars("initial-tag-1", "initial-tag-2")
  3.   <div>
  4.     { tagPicker(tags).bind }
  5.     <h3>全部标签：</h3>
  6.     <ol>{ for (tag <- tags) yield <li>{ tag }</li> }</ol>
  7.   </div>
  8. }

只要用 9 行代码另写一个 HTML 模板，在模板中调用刚才实现好的 tagPicker 就行了。
You only need to write another HTML template with 9 lines of code, and call the tagPicker that you just implemented in the template.

完整的 DEMO 请访问 ScalaFiddle。
For a complete demo, please visit ScalaFiddle.

在 Binding.scala 不需要像 ReactJS 那样编写 changeHandler 之类的回调函数。每当用户在 tagPicker 输入新的标签时，tags 就会改变，网页也就会自动随之改变。
In Binding.scala, there is no need to write callback functions like changeHandler like ReactJS. Whenever a user enters a new tag at tagPicker , tags will change and the page will automatically change accordingly.

对比 ReactJS 和 Binding.scala 的代码，可以发现以下区别：
Comparing the code of ReactJS and Binding.scala, the following differences can be found:

  • Binding.scala 的开发者可以用类似 tagPicker 这样的 @dom 方法表示 HTML 模板，而不需要组件概念。
    Binding.scala developers can use @dom methods like tagPicker to represent HTML templates without the concept of components.
  • Binding.scala 的开发者可以在方法之间传递 tags 这样的参数，而不需要 props 概念。
    Binding.scala developers can pass parameters like tags between methods without props concept.
  • Binding.scala 的开发者可以在方法内定义局部变量表示状态，而不需要 state 概念。
    Binding.scala developers can define local variables to represent state within methods, without state concept.

总的来说 Binding.scala 要比 ReactJS 精简不少。
In general, Binding.scala is much more streamlined than ReactJS.

如果你用过 ASP 、 PHP 、 JSP 之类的服务端网页模板语言，你会发现和 Binding.scala 的 HTML 模板很像。
If you have used server-side web page template languages ​​such as ASP, PHP, and JSP, you will find that it is very similar to the HTML template of Binding.scala.

使用 Binding.scala 一点也不需要函数式编程知识，只要把设计工具中生成的 HTML 原型复制到代码中，然后把会变的部分用花括号代替、把重复的部分用 for / yield 代替，网页就做好了。
Using Binding.scala does not require functional programming knowledge at all, just copy the HTML prototype generated in the design tool into the code, and then replace the part that will change with curly braces, and use for / yield for the repeated part Instead, the web page is ready.

结论
in conclusion

本文对比了不同技术栈中实现和使用可复用的标签编辑器的难度。
This article compares the difficulty of implementing and using reusable tag editors in different technology stacks.

Binding.scala does not invent gimmicks such as "components", but uses lighter "methods" as the minimum unit of reuse, which makes the programming experience smoother and achieves better code reusability.

More than React（三）虚拟DOM已死？
More than React (3) Virtual DOM is dead?

前端 binding.scala data-binding scala.js web

本系列的上一篇文章组件对复用性有害？探讨了如何在前端开发中编写可复用的界面元素。本篇文章中将从性能和算法的角度比较 Binding.scala 和其他框架的渲染机制。
Previous article in this series Are components bad for reusability? Discusses how to write reusable interface elements in front-end development. In this article, we will compare the rendering mechanism of Binding.scala and other frameworks from the perspective of performance and algorithm.

Binding.scala 实现了一套精确数据绑定机制，通过在模板中使用 bind 和 for/yield 来渲染页面。你可能用过一些其他 Web 框架，大多使用脏检查或者虚拟 DOM 机制。和它们相比，Binding.scala 的精确数据绑定机制使用更简单、代码更健壮、性能更高。
Binding.scala implements a precise data binding mechanism to render pages by using bind and for / yield in the template. You may have used some other web frameworks, most of them use dirty checking or virtual DOM mechanism. Compared with them, Binding.scala's precise data binding mechanism is simpler to use, more robust in code, and higher in performance.

ReactJS 虚拟 DOM 的缺点
Disadvantages of ReactJS Virtual DOM

比如， ReactJS 使用虚拟 DOM 机制，让前端开发者为每个组件提供一个 render 函数。render 函数把 props 和 state 转换成 ReactJS 的虚拟 DOM，然后 ReactJS 框架根据 render 返回的虚拟 DOM 创建相同结构的真实 DOM.
For example, ReactJS uses a virtual DOM mechanism to allow front-end developers to provide a render function for each component. The render function converts props and state into a ReactJS virtual DOM, and then the ReactJS framework creates a real DOM with the same structure based on the virtual DOM returned by render .

每当 state 更改时，ReactJS 框架重新调用 render 函数，获取新的虚拟 DOM 。然后，框架会比较上次生成的虚拟 DOM 和新的虚拟 DOM 有哪些差异，然后把差异应用到真实 DOM 上。
Whenever state changes, the ReactJS framework re-calls the render function to get a new virtual DOM. Then, the framework will compare the differences between the last generated virtual DOM and the new virtual DOM, and then apply the differences to the real DOM.

这样做有两大缺点：
This has two major disadvantages:

  1. 每次 state 更改，render 函数都要生成完整的虚拟 DOM. 哪怕 state 改动很小，render函数也会完整计算一遍。如果 render 函数很复杂，这个过程就白白浪费了很多计算资源。
    Every time state is changed, the render function will generate a complete virtual DOM. Even if state is changed slightly, the render function will calculate it completely. If the render function is very complicated, this process will waste a lot of computing resources.
  2. ReactJS 框架比较虚拟 DOM 差异的过程，既慢又容易出错。比如，假如你想要在某个 <ul> 列表的顶部插入一项 <li> ，那么 ReactJS 框架会误以为你修改了 <ul> 的每一项 <li>，然后在尾部插入了一个 <li>。
    The process by which the ReactJS framework compares virtual DOM differences is slow and error-prone. For example, if you want to insert a <li> at the top of a <ul> list, the ReactJS framework will mistakenly think that you have modified every <li> of <ul> , and then insert a <li> at the end.

这是因为 ReactJS 收到的新旧两个虚拟 DOM 之间相互独立，ReactJS 并不知道数据源发生了什么操作，只能根据新旧两个虚拟 DOM 来猜测需要执行的操作。自动的猜测算法既不准又慢，必须要前端开发者手动提供 key 属性、shouldComponentUpdate 方法、componentDidUpdate 方法或者 componentWillUpdate 等方法才能帮助 ReactJS 框架猜对。
This is because the old and new virtual DOMs received by ReactJS are independent of each other. ReactJS does not know what happened to the data source, and can only guess what needs to be done based on the old and new virtual DOMs. The automatic guessing algorithm is both inaccurate and slow. Front-end developers must manually provide key attributes, shouldComponentUpdate methods, componentDidUpdate methods or componentWillUpdate methods to help the ReactJS framework guess correctly.

AngularJS 的脏检查
AngularJS Dirty Checking

除了类似 ReactJS 的虚拟 DOM 机制，其他流行的框架，比如 AngularJS 还会使用基于脏检查的定值算法来渲染页面。
In addition to the virtual DOM mechanism like ReactJS, other popular frameworks, such as AngularJS, also use a fixed value algorithm based on dirty checking to render pages.

脏检查算法和 ReactJS 有一样的缺点，无法得知状态修改的意图，这使得 AugularJS 必须反复执行$digest轮循、反复检查各个ng-controller中的各个变量。除此之外，AngularJS 更新 DOM 的范围往往会比实际所需大得多，所以会比 ReactJS 还要慢。
Dirty checking algorithm has the same disadvantages as ReactJS, and cannot know the intention of state modification, which makes AugularJS have to repeatedly execute $digest round robin and repeatedly check each variable in each ng-controller. In addition, AngularJS tends to update the DOM in a much larger scope than it actually needs, so it will be slower than ReactJS.

Binding.scala 的精确数据绑定
Precise Data Binding with Binding.scala

Binding.scala 使用精确数据绑定算法来渲染 DOM 。
Binding.scala uses exact data binding algorithm to render DOM.

在 Binding.scala 中，你可以用 @dom 注解声明数据绑定表达式。@dom 会自动把 = 之后的代码包装成 Binding 类型。
In Binding.scala, you can declare data binding expressions with the @dom annotation. @dom will automatically wrap the code after = into Binding type.

比如：
for example:

  1. @dom val i: Binding[Int] = 1
  2. @dom def f: Binding[Int] = 100
  3. @dom val s: Binding[String] = "content"

@dom 既可用于 val 也可以用于 def ，可以表达包括 Int 、 String 在内的任何数据类型。
@dom can be used for both val and def , and can express any data type including Int and String .

除此之外，@dom 方法还可以直接编写 XHTML，比如：
In addition, the @dom method can also directly write XHTML, such as:

  1. @dom val comment: Binding[Comment] = <!-- This is a HTML Comment -->
  2. @dom val br: Binding[HTMLBRElement] = <br/>
  3. @dom val seq: Binding[BindingSeq[HTMLBRElement]] = <br/><br/>

这些 XHTML 生成的 Comment 和 HTMLBRElement 是 HTML Node 的派生类。而不是 XML Node。
These XHTML generated Comment and HTMLBRElement are HTML Node derived classes. Instead of XML Node.

每个 @dom 方法都可以依赖其他数据绑定表达式：
Each @dom method can depend on other data binding expressions:

  1. val i: Var[Int] = Var(0)
  2. @dom val j: Binding[Int] = 2
  3. @dom val k: Binding[Int] = i.bind * j.bind
  4. @dom val div: Binding[HTMLDivElement] = <div>{ k.bind.toString }</div>

通过这种方式，你可以编写 XHTML 模板把数据源映射为 XHTML 页面。这种精确的映射关系，描述了数据之间的关系，而不是 ReactJS 的 render 函数那样描述运算过程。所以当数据发生改变时，只有受影响的部分代码才会重新计算，而不需要重新计算整个 @dom 方法。
In this way, you can write XHTML templates that map data sources to XHTML pages. This precise mapping relationship describes the relationship between data, rather than describing the operation process like ReactJS's render function. So when the data changes, only the affected part of the code will be recalculated, without recalculating the entire @dom method.

比如：
for example:

  1. val count = Var(0)
  3. @dom def status: Binding[String] = {
  4.   val startTime = new Date
  5.   "本页面初始化的时间是" + startTime.toString + "。按钮被按过" + count.bind.toString + "次。按钮最后一次按下的时间是" + (new Date).toString
  6. }
  8. @dom def render = {
  9.   <div>
  10.     { status.bind }
  11.     <button onclick={ event: Event => count := count.get + 1 }>更新状态</button>
  12.   </div>
  13. }

以上代码可以在ScalaFiddle实际运行一下试试。
The above code can be run in ScalaFiddle to try it out.

注意，status 并不是一个普通的函数，而是描述变量之间关系的特殊表达式，每次渲染时只执行其中一部分代码。比如，当 count 改变时，只有位于 count.bind 以后的代码才会重新计算。由于 val startTime = new Date 位于 count.bind 之前，并不会重新计算，所以会一直保持为打开网页首次执行时的初始值。
Note that status is not an ordinary function, but a special expression describing the relationship between variables, and only a part of the code is executed each time it is rendered. For example, when count changes, only the code after count.bind will be recalculated. Since val startTime = new Date is located before count.bind , it will not be recalculated, so it will always remain the initial value when the webpage is opened for the first time.

有些人在学习 ReactJS 或者 AngularJS 时，需要学习 key 、 shouldComponentUpdate 、 $apply 、 $digest 等复杂概念。这些概念在 Binding.scala 中根本不存在。因为 Binding.scala 的 @dom 方法描述的是变量之间的关系。所以，Binding.scala 框架知道精确数据绑定关系，可以自动检测出需要更新的最小部分。
Some people need to learn complex concepts like key , shouldComponentUpdate , $apply , $digest when learning ReactJS or AngularJS. These concepts simply don't exist in Binding.scala. Because the @dom method of Binding.scala describes the relationship between variables. So, the Binding.scala framework knows the exact data binding relationship and can automatically detect the smallest part that needs to be updated.

结论
in conclusion

本文比较了虚拟 DOM 、脏检查和精确数据绑定三种渲染机制。
This article compares the three rendering mechanisms of virtual DOM, dirty checking and precise data binding.

AngularJS
AngularJS		ReactJS
ReactJS		Binding.scala
Binding. scala
渲染机制
rendering mechanism		基于脏检查的定值算法
Fixed value algorithm based on dirty check		 虚拟DOM
Virtual DOM		 精确数据绑定
exact data binding
数据变更时的运算步骤
Operation procedure when data is changed
  • 重复检查数据是否更改
    Double check if data has changed
  • 大范围更新页面，哪怕这部分页面根本没有修改
    Update pages on a large scale, even if this part of the page has not been modified at all
    		•
  • 重新生成整个虚拟DOM
    Regenerate the entire virtual DOM
  • 比较新旧虚拟DOM的差异
    Compare the difference between the old and new virtual DOM
  • 根据差异更新页面
    Update the page based on the diff
    		•
  • 直接根据数据映射关系，更新最小范围页面
    Update the minimum range page directly according to the data mapping relationship
    		•
    检测页面更新范围的准确性
    Detect accuracy of page update range    		 不准
    inaccurate    		 默认情况下不准，需要人工提供`key`和`shouldComponentUpdate`才能准一点
    It is inaccurate by default, you need to manually provide `key` and `shouldComponentUpdate` to be more accurate    		 准
    accurate
    需要前端工程师理解多少API和概念才能正确更新页面
    How many APIs and concepts do front-end engineers need to understand to properly update the page    		 很多
    a lot of     		很多
    a lot of     		只有`@dom`和`bind`两个概念
    There are only two concepts of `@dom` and `bind`
    总体性能
    overall performance    		 非常差
    very bad     		差
    Difference     		好
    good

    这三种机制中，Binding.scala 的精确数据绑定机制概念更少，功能更强，性能更高。我将在下一篇文章中介绍 Binding.scala 如何在渲染 HTML 时静态检查语法错误和语义错误，从而避免 bug 。
    Among these three mechanisms, Binding.scala's precise data binding mechanism has fewer concepts, stronger functions, and higher performance. In the next article I will describe how Binding.scala statically checks for syntax errors and semantic errors when rendering HTML, thereby avoiding bugs.

    More than React（四）HTML也可以静态编译？
    More than React (4) HTML can also be compiled statically?

    前端 binding.scala data-binding scala.js HTML

    《More than React》系列的上一篇文章虚拟DOM已死？比较了 Binding.scala 和其他框架的渲染机制。本篇文章中将介绍 Binding.scala 中的 XHTML 语法。
    The previous article in the More than React series Is virtual DOM dead? Comparing the rendering mechanism of Binding.scala and other frameworks. This article introduces the XHTML syntax in Binding.scala.

    其他前端框架的问题
    Issues with other front-end frameworks

    对 HTML 的残缺支持
    Incomplete support for HTML

    以前我们使用其他前端框架，比如 Cycle.js 、 Widok 、 ScalaTags 时，由于框架不支持 HTML 语法，前端工程师被迫浪费大量时间，手动把 HTML 改写成代码，然后慢慢调试。
    In the past, when we used other front-end frameworks, such as Cycle.js, Widok, and ScalaTags, because the framework did not support HTML syntax, front-end engineers were forced to waste a lot of time, manually rewriting HTML into code, and then slowly debugging.

    就算是支持 HTML 语法的框架，比如 ReactJS ，支持状况也很残缺不全。
    Even frameworks that support HTML syntax, such as ReactJS, support is patchy.

    比如，在 ReactJS 中，你不能这样写：
    For example, in ReactJS, you cannot write:

    1. class BrokenReactComponent extends React.Component {
    2.   render() {
    3.     return (
    4.       <ol>
    5.         <li class="unsupported-class">不支持 class 属性</li>
    6.         <li style="background-color: red">不支持 style 属性</li>
    7.         <li>
    8.           <input type="checkbox" id="unsupported-for"/>
    9.           <label for="unsupported-for">不支持 for 属性</label>
    10.         </li>
    11.       </ol>
    12.     );
    13.   }
    14. }

    前端工程师必须手动把 class 和 for 属性替换成 className 和 htmlFor，还要把内联的 style 样式从 CSS 语法改成 JSON 语法，代码才能运行：
    Front-end engineers must manually replace class and for attributes with className and htmlFor , and also change the inline style style from CSS syntax to JSON syntax before the code can run:

    1. class WorkaroundReactComponent extends React.Component {
    2.   render() {
    3.     return (
    4.       <ol>
    5.         <li className="workaround-class">被迫把 class 改成 className</li>
    6.         <li style={{ backgroundColor: "red" }}>被迫把样式表改成 JSON</li>
    7.         <li>
    8.           <input type="checkbox" id="workaround-for"/>
    9.           <label htmlFor="workaround-for">被迫把 for 改成 htmlFor</label>
    10.         </li>
    11.       </ol>
    12.     );
    13.   }
    14. }

    这种开发方式下，前端工程师虽然可以把 HTML 原型复制粘贴到代码中，但还需要大量改造才能实际运行。比 Cycle.js 、 Widok 或者 ScalaTags 省不了太多事。
    In this development method, although the front-end engineer can copy and paste the HTML prototype into the code, it still needs a lot of modification to actually run. Not much less work than Cycle.js, Widok or ScalaTags.

    不兼容原生 DOM 操作
    Incompatible with native DOM manipulation

    此外，ReactJS 等一些前端框架，会生成虚拟 DOM 。虚拟 DOM 无法兼容浏览器原生的 DOM API ，导致和 jQuery 、 D3 等其他库协作时困难重重。比如 ReactJS 更新 DOM 对象时常常会破坏掉 jQuery 控件。
    In addition, some front-end frameworks such as ReactJS will generate virtual DOM. The virtual DOM is not compatible with the browser's native DOM API, which makes it difficult to cooperate with other libraries such as jQuery and D3. For example, ReactJS often destroys jQuery controls when updating DOM objects.

    Reddit很多人讨论了这个问题。他们没有办法，只能弃用 jQuery。我司的某客户在用了 ReactJS 后也被迫用 ReactJS 重写了大量 jQeury 控件。
    Lots of people on Reddit have discussed this issue. They have no choice but to deprecate jQuery. A customer of our company was forced to rewrite a large number of jQuery controls with ReactJS after using ReactJS.

    Binding.scala 中的 XHTML
    XHTML in Binding.scala

    现在有了 Binding.scala ，可以在 @dom 方法中，直接编写 XHTML。比如：
    Now with Binding.scala, you can write XHTML directly in the @dom method. for example:

    1. @dom def introductionDiv = {
    2.   <div style="font-size:0.8em">
    3.     <h3>Binding.scala的优点</h3>
    4.     <ul>
    5.       <li>简单</li>
    6.       <li>概念少<br/>功能多</li>
    7.     </ul>
    8.   </div>
    9. }

    以上代码会被编译，直接创建真实的 DOM 对象，而没有虚拟 DOM 。
    The above code will be compiled to directly create real DOM objects without virtual DOM.

    Binding.scala 对浏览器原生 DOM 的支持很好，你可以在这些 DOM 对象上调用 DOM API ，与 D3 、 jQuery 等其他库交互也完全没有问题。
    Binding.scala supports the browser's native DOM very well. You can call DOM API on these DOM objects, and there is no problem in interacting with other libraries such as D3 and jQuery.

    ReactJS 对 XHTML 语法的残缺不全。相比之下，Binding.scala 支持完整的 XHTML 语法，前端工程师可以直接把设计好的 HTML 原型复制粘贴到代码中，整个网站就可以运行了。
    ReactJS' crippled XHTML syntax. In contrast, Binding.scala supports complete XHTML syntax, and front-end engineers can directly copy and paste the designed HTML prototype into the code, and the entire website can run.

    Binding.scala 中 XHTML 的类型
    Types of XHTML in Binding.scala

    @dom 方法中 XHTML 对象的类型是 Node 的派生类。
    The type of the XHTML object in the @dom method is a derived class of Node.

    比如，<div></div> 的类型就是 HTMLDivElement，而 <button></button> 的类型就是 HTMLButtonElement。
    For example, <div></div> is of type HTMLDivElement and <button></button> is of type HTMLButtonElement.

    此外， @dom 注解会修改整个方法的返回值，包装成一个 Binding。
    In addition, the @dom annotation will modify the return value of the entire method and wrap it into a Binding.

    1. @dom def typedButton: Binding[HTMLButtonElement] = {
    2.   <button>按钮</button>
    3. }

    注意typedButton是个原生的HTMLButtonElement，所以可以直接对它调用 DOM API。比如：
    Note that typedButton is a native HTMLButtonElement , so you can call the DOM API directly on it. for example:

    1. @dom val autoPrintln: Binding[Unit] = {
    2.   println(typedButton.bind.innerHTML) // 在控制台中打印按钮内部的 HTML
    3. }
    4. autoPrintln.watch()

    这段代码中，typedButton.bind.innerHTML 调用了 DOM API HTMLButtonElement.innerHTML。通过autoPrintln.watch()，每当按钮发生更新，autoPrintln中的代码就会执行一次。
    In this code, typedButton.bind.innerHTML calls the DOM API HTMLButtonElement.innerHTML. With autoPrintln.watch() , the code in autoPrintln will be executed every time the button is updated.

    其他 HTML 节点
    Other HTML nodes

    Binding.scala 支持 HTML 注释：
    Binding.scala supports HTML comments:

    1. @dom def comment = {
    2.   <!-- 你看不见我 -->
    3. }

    Binding.scala 也支持 CDATA 块：
    Binding.scala also supports CDATA blocks:

    1. @dom def inlineStyle = {
    2.   <section>
    3.     <style><![CDATA[
    4.       .highlight {
    5.         background-color:gold
    6.       }
    7.     ]]></style>
    8.     <p class="highlight">Binding.scala真好用！</p>
    9.   </section>
    10. }

    内嵌 Scala 代码
    Inline Scala code

    除了可以把 XHTML 内嵌在 Scala 代码中的 @dom 方法中，Binding.scala 还支持用 { ... } 语法把 Scala 代码内嵌到 XHTML 中。比如：
    In addition to the @dom method that can embed XHTML in Scala code, Binding.scala also supports embedding Scala code in XHTML with { ... } syntax. for example:

    1. @dom def randomParagraph = {
    2.   <p>生成一个随机数： { math.random.toString }</p>
    3. }

    XHTML 中内嵌的 Scala 代码可以用 .bind 绑定变量或者调用其他 @dom 方法，比如：
    Scala code embedded in XHTML can use .bind to bind variables or call other @dom methods, such as:

    1. val now = Var(new Date)
    2. window.setInterval(1000) { now := new Date }
    4. @dom def render = {
    5.   <div>
    6.     现在时间：{ now.bind.toString }
    7.     { introductionDiv.bind }
    8.     { inlineStyle.bind }
    9.     { typedButton.bind }
    10.     { comment.bind }
    11.     { randomParagraph.bind }
    12.   </div>
    13. }

    上述代码渲染出的网页中，时间会动态改变。
    In the web page rendered by the above code, the time will change dynamically.

    强类型的 XHTML
    Strongly Typed XHTML

    Binding.scala 中的 XHTML 都支持静态类型检查。比如：
    XHTML in Binding.scala supports static type checking. for example:

    1. @dom def typo = {
    2.   val myDiv = <div typoProperty="xx">content</div>
    3.   myDiv.typoMethod()
    4.   myDiv
    5. }

    由于以上代码有拼写错误，编译器就会报错：
    Since the above code has a typo, the compiler will report an error:

    1. typo.scala:23: value typoProperty is not a member of org.scalajs.dom.html.Div
    2.         val myDiv = <div typoProperty="xx">content</div>
    3.                      ^
    4. typo.scala:24: value typoMethod is not a member of org.scalajs.dom.html.Div
    5.         myDiv.typoMethod()
    6.               ^

    内联 CSS 属性
    Inline CSS properties

    用 style 属性设置内联样式时，style 的值是个字符串。比如：
    When setting inline styles with the style attribute, the value of style is a string. for example:

    1. @dom def invalidInlineStyle = {
    2.   <div style="color: blue; typoStyleName: typoStyleValue"></div>
    3. }

    以上代码中设置的 typoStyleName 样式名写错了，但编译器并没有报错。
    The typoStyleName style name set in the above code is wrong, but the compiler does not report an error.

    要想让编译器能检查内联样式，可以用 style: 前缀而不用 style 属性。比如：
    To enable the compiler to check inline styles, use style: prefixes instead of style attributes. for example:

    1. @dom def invalidInlineStyle = {
    2.   <div style:color="blue" style:typoStyleName="typoStyleValue"></div>
    3. }

    那么编译器就会报错：
    Then the compiler will report an error:

    1. typo.scala:28: value typoStyleName is not a member of org.scalajs.dom.raw.CSSStyleDeclaration
    2.         <div style:color="blue" style:typoStyleName="typoStyleValue"></div>
    3.          ^

    这样一来，可以在编写代码时就知道属性有没有写对。不像原生 JavaScript / HTML / CSS 那样，遇到 bug 也查不出来。
    In this way, you can know whether the attribute is written correctly when writing the code. Unlike native JavaScript/HTML/CSS, bugs cannot be found.

    自定义属性
    custom attributes

    如果你需要绕开对属性的类型检查，以便为 HTML 元素添加定制数据，你可以属性加上 data: 前缀，比如：
    If you need to bypass type checking on attributes to add custom data to HTML elements, you can prefix attributes with data: , for example:

    1. @dom def myCustomDiv = {
    2.   <div data:customAttributeName="attributeValue"></div>
    3. }

    这样一来 Scala 编译器就不会报错了。
    In this way, the Scala compiler will not report an error.

    结论
    in conclusion

    本文的完整 DEMO 请访问 ScalaFiddle。
    For a complete demo of this article, please visit ScalaFiddle.

    从这些示例可以看出，Binding.scala 一方面支持完整的 XHTML ，可以从高保真 HTML 原型无缝移植到动态网页中，开发过程极为顺畅。另一方面，Binding.scala 可以在编译时静态检查 XHTML 中出现语法错误和语义错误，从而避免 bug 。
    As can be seen from these examples, Binding.scala supports full XHTML on the one hand, and can be seamlessly migrated from high-fidelity HTML prototypes to dynamic web pages, and the development process is extremely smooth. On the other hand, Binding.scala can statically check XHTML for syntax errors and semantic errors at compile time, thus avoiding bugs.

    以下表格对比了 ReactJS 和 Binding.scala 对 HTML 语法的支持程度：
    The following table compares the HTML syntax support of ReactJS and Binding.scala:

    ReactJS

    Not supported, must use JSON syntax instead    		 支持，既支持标准的style属性也支持style:前缀
    Support, both standard style attributes and style: prefixes are supported
    是否支持标准的class属性？
    Is the standard class attribute supported?    		 不支持，必须改用className
    Not supported, must use className instead    		 支持，既支持class也支持className
    Support both class and className
    是否支持标准的for属性？
    Is the standard for attribute supported?    		 不支持，必须改用htmlFor
    Not supported, must use htmlFor instead    		 支持，既支持for也支持htmlFor

    是否支持HTML注释？
    Are HTML comments supported?    		 不支持

    More than React（五）异步编程是一种糟糕的编程模型？
    More than React (5) Is asynchronous programming a bad programming model?

    前端 binding.scala async scala.js 异步

    《More than React》系列的上一篇文章HTML也可以编译？介绍了 Binding.scala 如何在渲染 HTML 时静态检查语法错误和语义错误，从而避免 bug ，写出更健壮的代码。本篇文章将讨论Binding.scala和其他前端框架如何向服务器发送请求并在页面显示。
    The previous article in the "More than React" series HTML can also be compiled? Introduces how Binding.scala statically checks syntax errors and semantic errors when rendering HTML, thereby avoiding bugs and writing more robust code. This article will discuss how Binding.scala and other front-end frameworks send requests to the server and display them on the page.

    在过去的前端开发中，向服务器请求数据需要使用异步编程技术。异步编程的概念很简单，指在进行 I/O 操作时，不阻塞当前执行流，而通过回调函数处理 I/O 的结果。不幸的是，这个概念虽然简单，但用起来很麻烦，如果错用会导致 bug 丛生，就算小心翼翼的处理各种异步事件，也会导致程序变得复杂、更难维护。
    In the past front-end development, requesting data from the server required the use of asynchronous programming techniques. The concept of asynchronous programming is very simple. It means that when performing I/O operations, the current execution flow is not blocked, but the results of I/O are processed through callback functions. Unfortunately, although this concept is simple, it is cumbersome to use. If it is misused, it will lead to bugs. Even if you handle various asynchronous events carefully, it will make the program more complicated and harder to maintain.

    Binding.scala 可以用 I/O 状态的绑定代替异步编程，从而让程序又简单又好读，对业务人员也更友好。
    Binding.scala can replace asynchronous programming with I/O state binding, making the program simple and easy to read, and more friendly to business people.

    我将以一个从 Github 加载头像的 DEMO 页面为例，说明为什么异步编程会导致代码变复杂，以及 Binding.scala 如何解决这个问题。
    I will take a DEMO page that loads an avatar from Github as an example to explain why asynchronous programming makes the code complex and how Binding.scala solves this problem.

    DEMO 功能需求
    DEMO functional requirements

    作为 DEMO 使用者，打开页面后会看到一个文本框。
    As a DEMO user, you will see a text box after opening the page.

    在文本框中输入任意 Github 用户名，在文本框下方就会显示用户名对应的头像。
    Enter any Github username in the text box, and the avatar corresponding to the username will be displayed below the text box.

    要想实现这个需求，可以用 Github API 发送获取用户信息的 HTTPS 请求。
    To achieve this requirement, you can use the Github API to send HTTPS requests to get user information.

    发送请求并渲染头像的完整流程的验收标准如下：
    The acceptance criteria for the complete process of sending a request and rendering an avatar are as follows:

    • 如果用户名为空，显示“请输入用户名”的提示文字；
      If the user name is empty, display the prompt text of "Please enter the user name";
    • 如果用户名非空，发起 Github API，并根据 API 结果显示不同的内容：
      If the username is not empty, initiate the Github API and display different content according to the API result:
      • 如果尚未加载完，显示“正在加载”的提示信息；
        If the loading has not been completed, the prompt message "Loading" will be displayed;
      • 如果成功加载，把回应解析成 JSON，从中提取头像 URL 并显示；
        If successfully loaded, parse the response into JSON, extract the avatar URL from it and display it;
      • 如果加载时出错，显示错误信息。
        If an error occurs while loading, an error message is displayed.

    异步编程和 MVVM
    Asynchronous programming and MVVM

    过去，我们在前端开发中，会用异步编程来发送请求、获取数据。比如 ECMAScript 2015 的 Promise 和 HTML 5 的 fetch API。
    In the past, we used asynchronous programming to send requests and obtain data in front-end development. Examples include ECMAScript 2015's Promise and HTML 5's fetch API.

    而要想把这些数据渲染到网页上，我们过去的做法是用 MVVM 框架。在获取数据的过程中持续修改 View Model ，然后编写 View 把 View Model 渲染到页面上。这样一来，页面上就可以反映出加载过程的动态信息了。比如，ReactJS 的 state 就是 View Model，而 render 则是 View ，负责把 View Model 渲染到页面上。
    In order to render these data to the web page, our past practice is to use the MVVM framework. Continuously modify the View Model in the process of obtaining data, and then write the View to render the View Model to the page. In this way, the dynamic information of the loading process can be reflected on the page. For example, state of ReactJS is the View Model, while render is the View, which is responsible for rendering the View Model to the page.

    用 ReactJS 和 Promise 的实现如下：
    The implementation with ReactJS and Promise is as follows:

    1. class Page extends React.Component {
    3.   state = {
    4.     githubUserName: null,
    5.     isLoading: false,
    6.     error: null,
    7.     avatarUrl: null,
    8.   };
    10.   currentPromise = null;
    12.   sendRequest(githubUserName) {
    13.     const currentPromise = fetch(`https://api.github.com/users/${githubUserName}`);
    14.     this.currentPromise = currentPromise;
    15.     currentPromise.then(response => {
    16.       if (this.currentPromise != currentPromise) {
    17.         return;
    18.       }
    19.       if (response.status >= 200 && response.status < 300) {
    20.         return response.json();
    21.       } else {
    22.         this.currentPromise = null;
    23.         this.setState({
    24.           isLoading: false,
    25.           error: response.statusText
    26.         });
    27.       }
    28.     }).then(json => {
    29.       if (this.currentPromise != currentPromise) {
    30.         return;
    31.       }
    32.       this.currentPromise = null;
    33.       this.setState({
    34.         isLoading: false,
    35.         avatarUrl: json.avatar_url,
    36.         error: null
    37.       });
    38.     }).catch(error => {
    39.       if (this.currentPromise != currentPromise) {
    40.         return;
    41.       }
    42.       this.currentPromise = null;
    43.       this.setState({
    44.         isLoading: false,
    45.         error: error,
    46.         avatarUrl: null
    47.       });
    48.     });
    49.     this.setState({
    50.       githubUserName: githubUserName,
    51.       isLoading: true,
    52.       error: null,
    53.       avatarUrl: null
    54.     });
    55.   }
    57.   changeHandler = event => {
    58.     const githubUserName = event.currentTarget.value;
    59.     if (githubUserName) {
    60.       this.sendRequest(githubUserName);
    61.     } else {
    62.       this.setState({
    63.         githubUserName: githubUserName,
    64.         isLoading: false,
    65.         error: null,
    66.         avatarUrl: null
    67.       });
    68.     }
    69.   };
    71.   render() {
    72.     return (
    73.       <div>
    74.         <input type="text" onChange={this.changeHandler}/>
    75.         <hr/>
    76.         <div>
    77.           {
    78.             (() => {
    79.               if (this.state.githubUserName) {
    80.                 if (this.state.isLoading) {
    81.                   return <div>{`Loading the avatar for ${this.state.githubUserName}`}</div>
    82.                 } else {
    83.                   const error = this.state.error;
    84.                   if (error) {
    85.                     return <div>{error.toString()}</div>;
    86.                   } else {
    87.                     return <img src={this.state.avatarUrl}/>;
    88.                   }
    89.                 }
    90.               } else {
    91.                 return <div>Please input your Github user name</div>;
    92.               }
    93.             })()
    94.           }
    95.         </div>
    96.       </div>
    97.     );
    98.   }
    100. }

    一共用了 100 行代码。
    A total of 100 lines of code were used.

    由于整套流程由若干个闭包构成，设置、访问状态的代码五零四散，所以调试起来很麻烦，我花了两个晚上才调通这 100 行代码。
    Since the entire process is composed of several closures, and the code for setting and accessing the state is scattered, it is very troublesome to debug. It took me two nights to adjust the 100 lines of code.

    Binding.scala
    Binding. scala

    现在我们有了 Binding.scala ，由于 Binding.scala 支持自动远程数据绑定，可以这样写：
    Now that we have Binding.scala, since Binding.scala supports automatic remote data binding, we can write:

    1. @dom def render = {
    2.   val githubUserName = Var("")
    3.   def inputHandler = { event: Event => githubUserName := event.currentTarget.asInstanceOf[Input].value }
    4.   <div>
    5.     <input type="text" oninput={ inputHandler }/>
    6.     <hr/>
    7.     {
    8.       val name = githubUserName.bind
    9.       if (name == "") {
    10.         <div>Please input your Github user name</div>
    11.       } else {
    12.         val githubResult = FutureBinding(Ajax.get(s"https://api.github.com/users/${name}"))
    13.         githubResult.bind match {
    14.           case None =>
    15.             <div>Loading the avatar for { name }</div>
    16.           case Some(Success(response)) =>
    17.             val json = JSON.parse(response.responseText)
    18.             <img src={ json.avatar_url.toString }/>
    19.           case Some(Failure(exception)) =>
    20.             <div>{ exception.toString }</div>
    21.         }
    22.       }
    23.     }
    24.   </div>
    25. }

    一共 25 行代码。
    A total of 25 lines of code.

    完整的 DEMO 请访问 ScalaFiddle。
    For a complete demo, please visit ScalaFiddle.

    之所以这么简单，是因为 Binding.scala 可以用 FutureBinding 把 API 请求当成普通的绑定表达式使用，表示 API 请求的当前状态。
    The reason why it is so simple is that Binding.scala can use FutureBinding to treat API requests as ordinary binding expressions, representing the current state of API requests.

    每个 FutureBinding 的状态有三种可能，None表示操作正在进行，Some(Success(...))表示操作成功，Some(Failure(...))表示操作失败。
    There are three possibilities for the status of each FutureBinding , None indicates that the operation is in progress, Some(Success(...)) indicates that the operation is successful, and Some(Failure(...)) indicates that the operation failed.

    还记得绑定表达式的 .bind 吗？它表示“each time it changes”。
    Remember the .bind for bind expressions? It means "each time it changes".
    由于 FutureBinding 也是 Binding 的子类型，所以我们就可以利用 .bind ，表达出“每当远端数据的状态改变”的语义。
    Since FutureBinding is also a subtype of Binding, we can use .bind to express the semantics of "whenever the state of the remote data changes".

    结果就是，用 Binding.scala 时，我们编写的每一行代码都可以对应验收标准中的一句话，描述着业务规格，而非“异步流程”这样的技术细节。
    The result is that when using Binding.scala, every line of code we write can correspond to a sentence in the acceptance criteria, describing business specifications, rather than technical details such as "asynchronous process".

    让我们回顾一下验收标准，看看和源代码是怎么一一对应的：
    Let's review the acceptance criteria and see how they correspond to the source code:

    • 如果用户名为空，显示“请输入用户名”的提示文字；
      If the user name is empty, display the prompt text of "Please enter the user name";

      1. if (name == "") {
      2. <div>Please input your Github user name</div>

    • 如果用户名非空，发起 Github API，并根据 API 结果显示不同的内容：
      If the username is not empty, initiate the Github API and display different content according to the API result:

      1. } else {
      2. val githubResult = FutureBinding(Ajax.get(s"https://api.github.com/users/${name}"))
      3. githubResult.bind match {
      • 如果尚未加载完，显示“正在加载”的提示信息；
        If the loading has not been completed, the prompt message "Loading" will be displayed;
      1. case None =>
      2.   <div>Loading the avatar for { name }</div>
      • 如果成功加载，把回应解析成 JSON，从中提取头像 URL 并显示；
        If successfully loaded, parse the response into JSON, extract the avatar URL from it and display it;
      1. case Some(Success(response)) =>
      2.   val json = JSON.parse(response.responseText)
      3.   <img src={ json.avatar_url.toString }/>
      • 如果加载时出错，显示错误信息。
        If an error occurs while loading, an error message is displayed.
      1. case Some(Failure(exception)) => // 如果加载时出错，
      2.   <div>{ exception.toString }</div> // 显示错误信息。
      1. }
      2. }

    结论
    in conclusion

    本文对比了 ECMAScript 2015 的异步编程和 Binding.scala 的 FutureBinding 两种通信技术。Binding.scala 概念更少，功能更强，对业务更为友好。
    This article compares ECMAScript 2015's asynchronous programming and Binding.scala's FutureBinding two communication technologies. Binding.scala has fewer concepts, more functionality, and is more business-friendly.

    技术栈
    technology stack    		ReactJS + Promise + fetchBinding.scala
    Binding. scala
    编程范式
    programming paradigm    		 MVVM + 异步编程
    MVVM + asynchronous programming    		 远程数据绑定
    remote data binding
    如何管理数据加载流程
    How to manage the data loading process    		 程序员手动编写异步编程代码
    Programmer manually writes asynchronous programming code    		 自动处理
    automatic processing
    能不能用代码直接描述验收标准
    Can you directly describe the acceptance criteria in code    		 不能
    cannot     		能

    从RESTful API加载数据并显示所需代码行数
    Load data from RESTful API and display required lines of code    		 100行

    25 lines

    这五篇文章介绍了用 ReactJS 实现复杂交互的前端项目的几个难点，以及 Binding.scala 如何解决这些难点，包括：
    These five articles introduce several difficulties in implementing complex interactive front-end projects with ReactJS, and how Binding.scala solves these difficulties, including:

    • 复用性
      Reusability
    • 性能和精确性
      Performance and Accuracy
    • HTML模板
      HTML template
    • 异步编程
      asynchronous programming

    除了上述四个方面以外，ReactJS 的状态管理也是老大难问题，如果引入 Redux 或者 react-router 这样的第三方库来处理状态，会导致架构变复杂，分层变多，代码绕来绕去。而Binding.scala 可以用和页面渲染一样的数据绑定机制描述复杂的状态，不需要任何第三方库，就能提供服务器通信、状态管理和网址分发的功能。
    In addition to the above four aspects, the state management of ReactJS is also a long-standing problem. If a third-party library such as Redux or react-router is introduced to handle the state, the architecture will become more complex, the layers will increase, and the code will go around. Binding.scala can use the same data binding mechanism as page rendering to describe complex states, and can provide server communication, state management and URL distribution functions without any third-party libraries.

    如果你正参与复杂的前端项目，使用ReactJS或其他开发框架时，感到痛苦不堪，你可以用Binding.scala一举解决这些问题。Binding.scala快速上手指南中包含了从零开始创建Binding.scala项目的每一步骤。
    If you are involved in complex front-end projects and feel miserable when using ReactJS or other development frameworks, you can use Binding.scala to solve these problems in one fell swoop. The Binding.scala Quick Start Guide covers every step of creating a Binding.scala project from scratch.

    后记
    postscript

    Everybody's Got to Learn How to Code
    ——奥巴马
    — Obama

    编程语言是人和电脑对话的语言。对掌握编程语言的人来说，电脑就是他们大脑的延伸，也是他们身体的一部分。所以，不会编程的人就像是失去翅膀的天使。
    A programming language is a language for dialogue between humans and computers. For people who master programming languages, computers are an extension of their brains and a part of their bodies. Therefore, people who cannot program are like angels who have lost their wings.

    电脑程序是很神奇的存在，它可以运行，会看、会听、会说话，就像生命一样。会编程的人就像在创造生命一样，干的是上帝的工作。
    A computer program is a miraculous existence. It can run, see, listen, and speak, just like life. People who can program are like creating life, doing the work of God.

    我有一个梦想，梦想编程可以像说话、写字一样的基础技能，被每个人都掌握。
    I have a dream that programming can be mastered by everyone as a basic skill like speaking and writing.

    如果网页设计师掌握Binding.scala，他们不再需要找工程师实现他们的设计，而只需要在自己的设计稿原型上增加魔法符号.bind，就能创造出会动的网页。
    If web designers master Binding.scala, they no longer need to find engineers to realize their designs, but only need to add the magic symbol .bind to their design prototypes to create moving web pages.

    如果QA、BA或产品经理掌握Binding.scala，他们写下验收标准后，不再需要检查程序员干的活对不对，而可以把验收标准自动变成可以运转的功能。
    If QA, BA or product managers master Binding.scala, after they write the acceptance criteria, they no longer need to check whether the programmers are doing the right job, but can automatically turn the acceptance criteria into a function that can be run.

    我努力在Binding.scala的设计中消除不必要的技术细节，让人使用Binding.scala时，只需要关注他想传递给电脑的信息。
    I tried to eliminate unnecessary technical details in the design of Binding.scala, so that when people use Binding.scala, they only need to pay attention to the information he wants to pass to the computer.

    Binding.scala是我朝着梦想迈进的小小产物。我希望它不光是前端工程师手中的利器，也能成为普通人迈入编程殿堂的踏脚石。
    Binding.scala is my little creation towards a dream. I hope it is not only a sharp tool in the hands of front-end engineers, but also a stepping stone for ordinary people to enter the palace of programming.
